subtasks: FixViolationBatchOverviewHeading: Fix writeApp.md - BatchOverview component is missing 'Batch Overview' section heading; code only has 'Current Quantity & Properties' card heading but test spec expects both a section heading and a card heading
FixViolationLineageDiagramName: Fix testSpec.md - Rename LineageDiagram to LineageSection in docs/tests.md BatchDetailPage section (component list and section header) to match actual component name
FixViolationMissingLineageNavTest: Fix testSpec.md - Add test entry for clicking source transaction link in Lineage section navigates to TransactionDetailPage
FixViolationCreateNewTransactionButtonComponent: Fix testSpec.md - CreateNewTransactionButton is listed as standalone component but is part of BatchHeader; update component references accordingly
